org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.files

Class RecursiveFileObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.files.RecursiveFileObserver

  • public class RecursiveFileObserver
extends java.lang.Object
    A FileObserver that (optionally) observes all the files/folders within given directory recursively. It automatically starts/stops monitoring new folders/files created after starting the watch. It can also monitor individual files. We also make the paths easier to deal with by ALWAYS dealing in the currency of absolute paths.

    Adapted from https://gist.github.com/gitanuj/888ef7592be1d3f617f6
